snippet: The Nusra Front has been expanding its control in the northern province of Idlib, seizing territory from two Western-supported rebel organizations.
abstract: Syrian rebel group Nusra Front has expanded its control in northern province of Idlib, seizing territory from Western-supported rebel organizations and potentially threatening a critical border crossing with Turkey.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Mohammed Ghannam contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: The Nusra Front has been expanding its control in the northern province of Idlib, seizing territory from two Western-supported rebel organizations.

headline.main: As Qaeda-Backed Group Makes Gains, Rift Grows Among Rebels in Syria
headline.print_headline: As Qaeda-Backed Group Makes Gains, Rift Grows Among Rebels in Syria

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
